name: attendance-app-root
description: Root package for the attendance app

scripts.build: mkdir -p build-app && ls -la && cp -r client build-app/ && cp -r server build-app/ && cp vite.config.ts build-app/ && cp package.json build-app/ && cp tsconfig.json build-app/ && cd build-app && npm install --production=false && mkdir -p client/src && cp -r ../client/* client/ && mkdir -p node_modules/.vite && npx vite build && npx esbuild server/index.ts --platform=node --bundle --external:@google-cloud/* --external:lightningcss --external:@babel/* --format=cjs --outfile=dist/server.js && cd .. && mkdir -p dist/public && cp -r build-app/dist/public/* dist/public/ || true && cp build-app/dist/server.js dist/server.js || true
